summary:
His name is Fynn, a young Breton from High Rock.
Fynn always had a favor for magic and mystic things, that's the reason why he traveled all the way to Skyrim.
There he wanted to study at the academy of winterhold, sadly it's not longer what it used to be back in time.
All my Followers have an Schlongs of Skyrim support.
